Title: Murphy's Romance
Writer: Max Schott (based on the novella by), Harriet Frank Jr. (screenplay), Irving Ravetch (screenplay)
Actors: Sally Field, James Garner, Brian Kerwin, Corey Haim
Plot: Emma is a divorced woman with a teen-aged son who moves into a small town and tries to make a go of a horse ranch. Murphy is the widowed town druggist who steers business her way. Things are going along predictably until her ex-husband shows up, needing a place to stay. The three of them form an intricate circle, with Emma's son liking Murphy but desperately wanting his father back.
